anime.description: In 2007 two newly made episodes following the http://anidb.net/a7027 [Ukkari Penelope] television series were released as part of a Gift Box to commemorate the approaching Christmas. Both episodes were shown later on TV on http://anidb.net/cr1050 [NHK] shortly prior to Christmas on December, 22.
